cafes.name: Remedy Coffee
cafes.description: Meticulous brewing and innovative pour-over methods in the CBD.

cafes.name: Allpress Espresso
cafes.description: A New Zealand institution known for full-bodied and balanced espresso.

cafes.name: Chuffed
cafes.description: A hidden oasis courtyard in the CBD with a relaxed atmosphere and great coffee.

restaurants.name: Ahi
restaurants.description: Award-winning 3-Hat restaurant celebrating New Zealand cuisine. Chef Ben Bayly's innovative menu features organic, locally-sourced ingredients with iconic dishes like the Scampi Corn Dog.

restaurants.name: The Grove
restaurants.description: Exquisite modern New Zealand fine dining in a relaxed yet sophisticated atmosphere. Winner of multiple Metro Restaurant of the Year awards.
restaurants.address: St Patrick's Square, Wyndham Street, Auckland CBD

restaurants.name: Cassia
restaurants.description: Modern Indian fine dining with an exciting twist on traditional dishes. Plush interiors and a mouth-watering menu featuring signature roasted carrot with vindaloo.

indian-restaurants.name: 1947 Eatery
indian-restaurants.description: Authentic yet contemporary Indian dining with shared plates and tandoor dishes. Known for innovative flavors and modern presentation.

indian-restaurants.name: Satya South Indian Restaurant
indian-restaurants.description: Southern Indian specialist beyond butter chicken. Authentic Rajasthani dahi puri and special chicken curry with paratha.

indian-restaurants.name: Paradise Indian Restaurant
indian-restaurants.description: Multi-award-winning Indian restaurant in Sandringham with over 35 years of serving authentic North and South Indian cuisine. Famous for biryanis, tandoori specials, and generous vegetarian options.

italian-restaurants.name: Amano
italian-restaurants.description: Rustic yet elegant Italian dining in Auckland CBD. Artisan breads, fresh pastries, and handmade pasta with locally sourced ingredients.

italian-restaurants.name: Baduzzi
italian-restaurants.description: Italian-inspired menu in vibrant Wynyard Quarter. Outstanding meatballs and extensive wine selection in retro-chic atmosphere.

italian-restaurants.name: Prego
italian-restaurants.description: Iconic Ponsonby Road Italian restaurant and one of Auckland's longest-running dining institutions. Beloved for its buzzing atmosphere, wood-fired pizzas, handmade pasta, and exceptional wine list spanning 30+ years.

thai-restaurants.name: Nahm
thai-restaurants.description: Traditional Thai with modern Asian twist. Sharing-style menu designed for groups and authentic flavors.

thai-restaurants.name: @Bangkok
thai-restaurants.description: Popular Kingsland neighborhood spot. Famous for massaman curry with 'ugly puffy roti' - a local favorite.

thai-restaurants.name: Thai Street
thai-restaurants.description: Vibrant Auckland CBD Thai eatery bringing authentic Bangkok street food flavours to New Zealand. Pad see ew, green curry, and mango sticky rice prepared by Thai-born chefs using imported ingredients.

french-restaurants.name: The French Caf√©
french-restaurants.description: Auckland's premier fine dining French restaurant. Contemporary French cuisine with seasonal NZ ingredients.

french-restaurants.name: Origine
french-restaurants.description: Spectacular French dining on Auckland's waterfront. Classic techniques with best of NZ produce.

french-restaurants.name: Clooney
french-restaurants.description: One of Auckland's most acclaimed fine dining restaurants blending French technique with New Zealand produce. Multi-award-winning chef-driven tasting menus, an exceptional wine programme, and sophisticated Freemans Bay setting.
